item.description:
Join us for a cultural journey to El Per√∫ through the generous guidance of Carlos Rosales, a new Meetup member, and his Peruvian friends and contacts. Bring a dish to share and also enjoy a plato tipico/Peruvian dish as well as a Pisco Sour. Learn more about the amazing tourist attractions of Peru including a brief history of the Incas and pre-Incan indigenous culture. As a special treat, Danzas Peruanas will demonstrate Peruvian dances. Last but not least, we will all have a chance to do Latin dancing.

Note: due to space limitations the RSVP is Yes or No. There is no Maybe option.

Bring: food to share

Questions: Carlos Rosales Home number: (860)561-9879, Cell number: (860)416-0229 or contact Karen Dworski 922-7997 after 7 p.m. or cell 922-7997

Directions: go to http://maps.google.co...

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: A Taste of Peru: Food,History, Dance, Tourism, Etc.
